creditline: Gift of the family of Esther Parada:  Adam Wilson, son; Margo Davion and Susan Peters, sisters; and Benjamin Glaser, brother
description: figure wearing a dark garment, with a baby strapped to back, seated on a sidewalk, seen from back; mounted to board
dimension: 19 5/8 x 15 1/2 in. (49.85 x 39.37 cm) (image, sheet, mount)
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on back, in black ink: [(SUCRE, BOLIVIA) / CHOLA & CHILD]
title: Chola and Child, Sucre, Bolivia
